title: Secure investment in ICOs
description: The only safe way to secure your funds in ICOs based on milestones completion
jumbo_heading: A platform for secure investment in ICO
jumbo_list_item_3: 8 out of 10 investors lose their investments, our platform will help to avoid this
jumbo_note_part_1: In escrow principle buyers and sellers use "a third authorised party" to hold goods and payments until all parties fulfill their obligations. In our case, a "third party" is a smart contract that will not allow the project to receive funds when the breach of obligations to achieve the milestones of the declared roadmap is taking place.
main_info_form_paragraph_line_1: Your contacts will never be passed to third parties,
project_paragraph: Projects that are safe to invest
how_it_works_list_item_1_paragraph: Do you have ETH or credit card? Our platform will help you to invest in prospective project
how_it_works_list_item_3_paragraph: Our platform guarantees that your investment is secured. We follow strict compliance with the projects' obligations to you.
how_it_works_list_item_5_paragraph: We are interested in leading the project to success to maximum extent, assist you in getting profit or save up to 90% of your investment.
features_list_item_2_line_2: the real team we know personally
features_list_item_3_line_3: to attract Contributors with guarantee of
footer_paragraph_line_1: Your contacts will never be passed to third parties, we will not spam you.
